thread.title: Prep Roundup: Sequoyah caps area perfection
thread.title_full: Prep Roundup: Sequoyah caps area perfection

author: Tribune staff reports (noreply@cherokeetribune.com)
title: Prep Roundup: Sequoyah caps area perfection
text: Prep Roundup: Sequoyah caps area perfection by Tribune staff reports Cherokee Tribune September 30, 2015 12:22 AM | 686 views | 0 | 3 | | Sequoyah completed an undefeated run through its half of Area 7 , beating Woodland-Bartow 25-8, 25-7, 25-18 on Tuesday.The Lady Chiefs (13-10, 5-0) will be one of two No. 1 seeds, facing the No. 7 seed from the other half Tuesday at River Ridge. The tournament will continue the following Thursday and Saturday at Cambridge.Sequoyah celebrated its senior night, with Kelley Hartman totaling six kills, three blocks and an ace, and twin sister Lauren Hartman finishing with five kills, three aces and five digs. A third senior, Kayla Campbell, had two kills, an ace and four digs.Before beginning the area tournament, Sequoyah will face its neighbors in the annual county round-robin. The Lady Chiefs will host Cherokee and River Ridge on Thursday before facing Etowah, Woodstock and Creekview on Saturday at Cherokee. Share This Article | similar stories
